tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loan_applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    application_date DATE,
    approval_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE loan_approvals (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id UUID,
    approval_status TEXT,
    approval_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES loan_applications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE loan_repayments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id UUID,
    repayment_amount DECIMAL,
    repayment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (loan_id) REFERENCES loan_applications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE loan_approvals (
  approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id INT,
  approval_date DATE,
  approved_amount DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_application_id FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES loan_applications(application_id)
);

CREATE TABLE repayments (
  repayment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  approval_id INT,
  repayment_date DATE,
  amount_paid DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_approval_id FOREIGN KEY (approval_id) REFERENCES loan_approvals(approval_id)
);
